price: Mereka tidak berhak mendapat syafaat kecuali orang yang telah mengadakan perjanjian di sisi Tuhan Yang Maha Pemurah 910.
arabic: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا
footnotes: 910.  Maksudnya "mengadakan perjanjian dengan Allah" ialah menjalankan segala perintah Allah dengan beriman dan bertakwa kepada-Nya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā yamlikūna al-shafāʿata illā mani ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
